scripts.watch: sass --watch sass:stylesheets & sass --watch type_quiz/sass:type_quiz/stylesheets & sass --watch kerning_game/sass:kerning_game/stylesheets & sass --watch font_pairing/sass:font_pairing/stylesheets & sass --watch readability/sass:readability/stylesheets & sass --watch type_scale/sass:type_scale/stylesheets
scripts.build: sass --no-source-map --style compressed sass:stylesheets & sass --no-source-map --style compressed type_quiz/sass:type_quiz/stylesheets & sass --no-source-map --style compressed kerning_game/sass:kerning_game/stylesheets & sass --no-source-map --style compressed font_pairing/sass:font_pairing/stylesheets & sass --no-source-map --style compressed readability/sass:readability/stylesheets & sass --no-source-map --style compressed type_scale/sass:type_scale/stylesheets & minify js/main.js > js/main.min.js
